attributes.action: STOP MP's being patrons or hold any other roles/positions within a charity
attributes.background: Many MP's voted in favour of benefit cuts & are also associated with charities for those directly affected proving a lack of support and a conflict of interest.To avoid this MP's should resign their position within charities immediately & should not be allowed association with charities in any role.

rejection.details:
This is a decision for individual MPs and charities.

If you would like the law to be changed, so that anyone who is a patron or a trustee of a charity is automatically disqualified from being an MP, you could start a petition calling for that.
